overview: LIVE:  Egypt, Sensation 2005, Global Gathering, Amnesia Closing weekend, In Charge Outdoor, In Charge (Trance Energy)  VIDEOS:  False Light, Second Bite, More Than A Life Away, Red Blue Purple, Automanual, Toys For Humanoids EXTRA FEATURE:  - Marco V Live @ Sensation 2005 as an MP3 file
